response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional product. I am confident that this price reflects both the value of the product and the opportunity it presents for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 10000}
